channel.title: 508 FullScreen HD Server Needs Coders!
channel.description:
[center]Hello! I got bored one day and thought to myself, HEY! I could make a private server just like I used to do back when I got bored like a year ago! So now I am putting this idea back into action! I can't really do it on my own though because I'm not that good of a coder...
SO! I need a few people to code, make models and help me make this an awesome private server that people can have fun on and enjoy! Once you join my team I will send you what I have on the server so far and we can code it up until I feel the server is ready to launch! Then I will buy a VPS so we can be up 24/7 and we'll see how it goes!
What I'm Looking For 1. People I don't mind talking to 2. People who know what they're doing 3. People who won't abuse they're rights and be asses
My Goals for the Server?
Personally I like the new HD 614 servers so that's what I will be doing! I'm not sure how good my ideas are so I'll tell em to you once I hire you and we'll see where it goes
Staff: Coder 1. 2.
Modeler 1. 2.
That's it, all I'm really looking for are 2 coders and 2 moders, I'm not going to put myself as a coder however because I don't feel I'm that good lol.
Application- Name: Age: Aim: How long can you be on each day: Applying For: Experience: Some of your Ideas:[/center]

[center]Hello!
I got bored one day and thought to myself, HEY! I could make a private server just like I used to do back when I got bored like a year ago!
So now I am putting this idea back into action!
I can’t really do it on my own though because I’m not that good of a coder…
